trans-unit.target: 你可以从你坟墓场中施放希欧蕊信徒罗娜，但在其他费用以外，还须弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·188 | Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While many fought valiantly to preserve humanity, Rona wished only to strip hers away.
trans-unit.target: 正当众生英勇奋战为保人性存续时，罗娜只想将自身的人性抹除干净。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
